00046 // ===========================================================================
00047 // method definitions
00048 // ===========================================================================
00049 NBJunctionTypesMatrix::NBJunctionTypesMatrix() {
00050     myMap['t'] = NODETYPE_TRAFFIC_LIGHT;
00051     myMap['x'] = NODETYPE_NOJUNCTION;
00052     myMap['p'] = NODETYPE_PRIORITY_JUNCTION;
00053     myMap['r'] = NODETYPE_RIGHT_BEFORE_LEFT;
00054     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(0. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(10. / 3.6)));
00055     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(10. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(30. / 3.6)));
00056     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(30. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(50. / 3.6)));
00057     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(50. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(70. / 3.6)));
00058     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(70. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(100. / 3.6)));
00059     myRanges.push_back(std::pair<SUMOReal, SUMOReal>((SUMOReal)(100. / 3.6), (SUMOReal)(999999. / 3.6)));
00060     //                 00001x
00061     //                 13570x
00062     //                 00000x
00063     myValues.push_back("rppppp"); // 000 - 010
00064     myValues.push_back(" rpppp"); // 010 - 030
00065     myValues.push_back("  rppp"); // 030 - 050
00066     myValues.push_back("   ppp"); // 050 - 070
00067     myValues.push_back("    pp"); // 070 - 100
00068     myValues.push_back("     p"); // 100 -
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 NBJunctionTypesMatrix::~NBJunctionTypesMatrix() {}
00073 
00074 
00075 SumoXMLNodeType
00076 NBJunctionTypesMatrix::getType(SUMOReal speed1, SUMOReal speed2) const {
00077     RangeCont::const_iterator p1 = find_if(myRanges.begin(), myRanges.end(), range_finder(speed1));
00078     RangeCont::const_iterator p2 = find_if(myRanges.begin(), myRanges.end(), range_finder(speed2));
00079     char name = getNameAt(distance(myRanges.begin(), p1), distance(myRanges.begin(), p2));
00080     return myMap.find(name)->second;
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 char
00085 NBJunctionTypesMatrix::getNameAt(size_t pos1, size_t pos2) const {
00086     std::string str = myValues[pos1];
00087     if (str[pos2] == ' ') {
00088         return getNameAt(pos2, pos1);
00089     }
00090     return str[pos2];
00091 }
